Commentary: Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, full and hurtles in to beat the flick and hit Watson's pad
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, back of a length and holds its line on middle, Watson blocks with a straight bat
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, Wright dives across to his right from backward point, shows off his athleticism to stop this cut from Watson. He had width to work with, but did not nail the gap
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, length and angled in, patted back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, back of a length and on off, Watson seeks to dab a cut, he nearly drags it back onto the stumps
Anwar Ali to Watson, 1 run, low full toss on middle, Anwar escapes punishment. Watson flicks his wrists and plays it along the carpet through midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, no run, tossed up and drifts in, defended back
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, no run, skiddy arm-ball, comes in from wide of the crease. Kept out
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, 1 run, full on middle and leg, clipped neatly through midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, slides across off, shorter, squirted to midwicket via an inside edge
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, FOUR, flighted and arrows in with the angle, Watson goes straight down the ground. Just a little shimmy and Watson timed it to perfection
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, 1 run, darted flat on middle, Watson sweeps in the air over midwicket, there is a man patrolling the boundary
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, leg-stump full toss, Watson finds short fine leg with a flick.... like target practice
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, touch short and outside off, Watson leans back and chops to cover point
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, overpitched on middle, driven to mid-off
Anwar Ali to Watson, FOUR, fractionally short and wide outside off, Watson sizes it up. He sends it clattering between mid-off and covers with a cut
Anwar Ali to Watson, FOUR, too full and on the leg stump. Wrong line and length. Punished. Watson drop-kicks it over midwicket
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, shortish again, Anwar Ali sends this ball thudding into the thigh pad. Watson did not make contact with the pull
Zulfiqar Babar to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, fired into the pads, swept firmly through square leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, SIX, tossed up on middle, Watson nimbly skips out and lofts it handsomely over long-on
Zulfiqar Babar to Watson, 1 run, arm-ball, Watson camps back and turns it wide of square leg

Zulfiqar Babar to Sharjeel Khan, OUT, Sharjeel steps out, manufactures a full toss, and holes out to deep midwicket. Sharjeel was on the move as he mis-hit it to Akbar-ur-Rehman. He did not even have to budge
Wicket: ['Sharjeel Khan c Akbar-ur-Rehman b Zulfiqar Babar 2 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, SIX, looped up, Haddin steps out now, and launches it over long-off. First ball in the PSL, and six
Zulfiqar Babar to Haddin, no run, slid through on off, defended to cover
Aizaz Cheema to Watson, 2 runs, full and angled in from wide of the crease, Watson glides it to third man. Haddin was late on the second, but made it in the end
Aizaz Cheema to Watson, 1 run, rising short ball outside off, quelled to point
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, slower ball on middle, angled in, nudged to midwicket
Aizaz Cheema to Watson, 1 run, short and homing in on top of off, Watson backs away slightly and secures a single to third man. Opened the face of the bat and ran it down
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 2 runs, short and width, Haddin rises on top of the bounce and lashes it in the gap at cover. The ball gets plugged in the deep
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, back of a length and slides in with the angle on off. Haddin jabs his bat down and manages an inside edge that rolls away to the midwicket region
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, 1 run, speared short on middle, hurries onto Haddin. Pulled away to deep midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, slides on, fizzes off the surface outside off, keeps low and beats the cut
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, Watson steps away just outside leg, Nawaz chases him with a fast one, jabbed to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, SIX, Watson shuffles away outside leg again, Nawaz angles it in to the hips. Watson smashes a slog sweep over midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, SIX, and again! Watson clears long-on and raises the fifty. Short and outside leg as Watson backs away. Swung away over the fielder. Boom!
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, 2 runs, Watson attacks this full ball too, slicing it over cover
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, no run, back of a length and angled in from wide of the crease, shoots low to foil Haddin's late cut. Beaten
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, no run, zippy back of a length ball outside off, beats Haddin again
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, slower ball outside off, Haddin waits for the ball to arrive and dabs it to backward point

Aizaz Cheema to Watson, OUT, Cheema beats Watson for pace. Short, rushing ball. Watson looks to go over midwicket with a pull. He only sends a top edge over the cover region. Shehzad runs in and completes a good, tumbling catch
Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, no run, short and zips off the surface to hit the bat hard. Played to point
Wicket: ['SR Watson c Ahmed Shehzad b Aizaz Cheema 40 (28b 3x4 3x6) SR: 142.85']

Commentary: Aizaz Cheema to Haddin, 1 run, full and holds its line outside off, helped to third man
Elliott to Haddin, no run, 109.4ks, back of a length and outside off, poked back to the bowler
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run, Haddin heaves and drags an inside edge to short fine leg
Elliott to Khalid Latif, 1 run, slow back of a length ball, straight in line, tucked through midwicket
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run, full on middle and leg, tickled to midwicket off an inside edge
Elliott to Khalid Latif, 1 run, clipped through backward square leg now

Elliott to Haddin, OUT, Sarfraz thinks he has Haddin. Canny full ball outside off, Haddin stretches forward, swings and does not connect. Done in by lack of pace. He loses his balance in the process. Did Haddin drag his back foot back in time? No. The foot is on the line when Sarfraz takes the bails off
Mohammad Nawaz to Khalid Latif, no run, darted in and spins to catch the pad as the new man misses the leg-side swat
Mohammad Nawaz to Khalid Latif, 1 run, flat and quick on the pads, swept behind square
Wicket: ['BJ Haddin st †Sarfraz Ahmed b Elliott 15 (15b 0x4 1x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, 1 run, tucked behind square leg again
Mohammad Nawaz to Khalid Latif, 1 run, short and outside off, slapped through point
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, no run, Billings comes down the track, does not meet the pitch and yorks himself. Kept out
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, 1 run, drifts in, full on middle, flicked through midwicket

Elliott to Billings, OUT, two wickets in two balls for Elliott. Full legcutter, grips in the pitch, turns away and catches the back pad. Billings plays across the line, he can't make contact. Trapped plumb in front. Viv Richards is delighted in the dug out
Elliott to Imran Khalid, 1 run, full and outside off, front-foot drive through cover
Elliott to Khalid Latif, 1 run, clipped through mid-on for a single
Elliott to Imran Khalid, no run, skiddy back of a length ball, cuts back in, to hit the thigh
Elliott to Imran Khalid, no run, chopped to backward point
Elliott to Imran Khalid, no run, slow roller outside off, guided to short third man
Mohammad Nabi to Khalid Latif, no run, offbreak, zips in to rap the front pad. Perhaps, it was doing too much
Mohammad Nabi to Khalid Latif, no run, Latif uses his feet and is beaten by turn and bounce. Inside edged onto the pad?
Mohammad Nabi to Khalid Latif, 1 run, worked around the corner to short fine leg
Mohammad Nabi to Imran Khalid, no run, round-arm ball, defended
Mohammad Nabi to Imran Khalid, 1 run, short and outside off, edges a cut to short third man. KP dives to his right and stops the ball

Mohammad Nabi to Khalid Latif, OUT, another appeal for lbw, this is given! Good length offbreak, Latif slogs across the line and does not connect. Hit on the thigh. Umpire Dar raises the finger. The tracker, though, shows that it would have just bounced over the stumps
Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, no run, Khalid steps out and is beaten in flight. Squeezed oout
Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, no run, slides on outside off, cut and a miss
Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, no run, skiddy full ball, pushed back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, no run, fizzes through outside off, beats the cut. This wasn't too short to be cut away
Wicket: ['Khalid Latif lbw b Mohammad Nabi 6 (10b 0x4 0x6) SR: 60.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, 2 runs, darted outside off, sliced drive behind square on the off side
Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, 1 run, slapped from outside off to deep point
Mohammad Nabi to Imran Khalid, 1 run, pushed through outside off, swept behind square
Mohammad Nabi to Kamran Ghulam, no run, offbreak on off, dropped defensively in front of his feet
Mohammad Nabi to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run, turn and bounce outside off, played towards backward point
Mohammad Nabi to Imran Khalid, no run, the batsman uses his feet, but does not meet the pitch. Hit on the pad

Mohammad Nabi to Imran Khalid, 2 runs, Anwar Ali runs to his right from long-off and shells it. "It helps" says Haddin. Full and outside off, sliced in the air... Anwar covers some ground but can't hang on
Mohammad Nabi to Imran Khalid, FOUR, shortish and outside off, with extra bounce, top-edged cut behind point, runs away for four
Mohammad Nawaz to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run, full and aimed at the pads, jabbed through midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, SIX, length ball wide outside off, swiped for a six, in the gap between midwicket and long-on

Mohammad Nawaz to Imran Khalid, OUT, Nawaz hits back and finds the edge. He fires a flat, faster ball outside off. Nawaz generates just enough bounce. Khalid shapes to cut, loses his shape, and nicks it behind to the keeper
Mohammad Nawaz to Russell, no run, slides on middle, Russell pushes it back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Russell, no run, darted outside off, Russell looks to cut now. Misses
Mohammad Nawaz to Russell, no run, arm-ball, snakes in on off, defended
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Ghulam, no run, angled in, held up in the pitch, chipped in front of Babar
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Ghulam, 2 runs, full ball on off, wild slog-sweep over midwicket
Wicket: ['Imran Khalid c †Sarfraz Ahmed b Mohammad Nawaz 18 (18b 1x4 1x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run, slides in with the arm on middle, turned to short fine leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, no run, yorker, nailed at the base of off.Russell jabs his bat down hurriedly
Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, 1 run, 93ks dart on the stumps, hacked to the leg side
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Ghulam, no run, Babar gives this more air outside off, Ghulam uses his feet and drives to cover
Elliott to Russell, 1 run, flicked off the pads through backward square leg
Elliott to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run, fractionally short and straight in line, lap pulled away behind square on the leg side
Elliott to Russell, 1 run, bumpy short slow ball outside off, top-edged pull, lands in front of deep midwicket
Elliott to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run
Elliott to Russell, FOUR, 104.4ks back of a length and outside off, Russell loads up and flat-bat whacks it to the left of Elliott
Elliott to Russell, 1 run, length and outside off, drilled forcefully to deep cover
Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, no run, blockhole ball, dug out
Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, 1 run, yorker, Russell steps away and drills to long-off
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run, slower through the air, angled in from wide of the crease. Swept behind square
Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, 1 run, pretty full and outside off, muscled through the covers
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Ghulam, 1 run, down the track, this full toss is driven to long-off

Zulfiqar Babar to Russell, OUT, Sarfraz hugs and jumps onto Babar. Full, straight ball. Russell slogs across the line. He can't make contact and is out leg-before. Russell goes and with it Islamabad's chances of a healthy total?

Elliott to Kamran Ghulam, OUT, top running catch at deep midwicket. A touch short on off, Ghulam pulls in the air. Anwar Ali sprints in from deep midwicket, plunges forward, to grab it. Elliott is having a ball in Sharjah
Elliott to Saeed Ajmal, 1 run, back of a length on off, poked behind square
Elliott to Rumman Raees, 1 run, slower roller on middle, prodded towards point from the crease
Elliott to Saeed Ajmal, SIX, floated full and outside off, Ajmal clears long-off with a lofted hit
Elliott to Saeed Ajmal, 1 run, too straight in line, whipped through backward square leg
Wicket: ['AD Russell lbw b Zulfiqar Babar 10 (13b 1x4 0x6) SR: 76.92']

Commentary: Elliott to Rumman Raees, no run, gentle roller on off, defended to cover
Aizaz Cheema to Saeed Ajmal, 1 run, full and wide outside off, played behind point, towards third man
Wicket: ['Kamran Ghulam c Anwar Ali b Elliott 9 (12b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00']

Commentary: Aizaz Cheema to Rumman Raees, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, flat-batted to mid-off
Aizaz Cheema to Saeed Ajmal, 1 run, middle-stump yorker, squeezed through square leg off the inside half of the bat
Aizaz Cheema to Rumman Raees, no run, length ball outside off, flat-bat thump ram-rod straight down the ground, so much so it hits the stumps at Cheema's end. The zing bails go flying
Aizaz Cheema to Rumman Raees, OUT, Raaes charges down the track. He misses this slower ball. Cheema hits the leg stump. How soft was that?Islamabad nine down
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Irfan, no run, short ball on off, defended to midwicket
Anwar Ali to Saeed Ajmal, OUT, Islamabad 117 all out. Slower ball, Ajmal plays a weak pull and holes out to deep square leg
